<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Check the task subscription"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/project/task/{taskid:[0-9]+}/subscribe"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks the subscription to the notifications about the actions performed with the selected task.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"taskid":{"description":"Task ID","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Boolean value: true - subscribed, false - unsubscribed","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
